Enum SFDCAccessController.OperationMode

Enclosing class:
SFDCAccessController
public static enum SFDCAccessController.OperationMode

OperationMode - this enum defines the DB operations mode to be used.
You can set the operation mode in the constructor or later using the setOperatoinMode() method. If you use the default constructor, we will set it to ALL_OR_NONE.

Enum Constant Summary
ALL_OR_NONE
          Will make sure all required fields have the proper permissions before any operation takes place.
BEST_EFFORT
          Will only set fields that are allowed.
 

Enum Constant Detail

ALL_OR_NONE

public static final SFDCAccessController.OperationMode ALL_OR_NONE
Will make sure all required fields have the proper permissions before any operation takes place.

BEST_EFFORT

public static final SFDCAccessController.OperationMode BEST_EFFORT
Will only set fields that are allowed. Other fields will be omitted from operation, but operation will continue.
